title: International
content:
KEC International has landed a significant Rs 1,064 crore contract in Saudi Arabia for a 380 kV transmission line. This latest win, part of a strong Middle East performance, boosts the company's international transmission and distribution order book.  With year-to-date orders exceeding Rs 15,000 crore, KEC International continues its global infrastructure expansion.

London's former US Embassy is now the Rosewood Chancery, a luxury hotel.  It offers state-of-the-art spa facilities and opulent suites.  The hotel boasts multiple dining options and a popular rooftop bar.  Despite high prices, the detailed service and design make it a standout.  The Chancery is attracting significant attention and demand from guests.
